title: Culture day at school - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: many which says my children are having a cultural day at school in which they are required to bring food and wear the outfits of their culture is this permissible to send them no problem Michelle I don't see any a festival or our Eid or an event that is reoccurring and it becoming a bit this is happening in all children's school they learn about cultures they eat the food and they get to have a good time I feel that there is nothing wrong in sha Allah in that
